00063 #define PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(module, name) PyModule_AddIntConstant(module, # name, name)
00064 
00065 PyDoc_STRVAR(M_gpu_doc,
00066 "This module provides access to the GLSL shader."
00067 );
00068 static struct PyModuleDef gpumodule = {
00069     PyModuleDef_HEAD_INIT,
00070     "gpu",     /* name of module */
00071     M_gpu_doc, /* module documentation */
00072     -1,        /* size of per-interpreter state of the module,
00073                 *  or -1 if the module keeps state in global variables. */
00074     NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL
00075 };
00076 
00077 PyMODINIT_FUNC
00078 PyInit_gpu(void)
00079 {
00080     PyObject *m;
00081 
00082     m = PyModule_Create(&gpumodule);
00083     if (m == NULL)
00084         return NULL;
00085 
00086     // device constants
00087     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_VIEWMAT);
00088     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_MAT);
00089     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_VIEWIMAT);
00090     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_IMAT);
00091     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_COLOR);
00092     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_OBJECT_AUTOBUMPSCALE);
00093     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNVEC);
00094     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNCO);
00095     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNIMAT);
00096     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNPERSMAT);
00097     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNENERGY);
00098     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_LAMP_DYNCOL);
00099     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DBUFFER);
00100     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DIMAGE);
00101     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DSHADOW);
00102 
00103     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DATA_1I);
00104     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DATA_1F);
00105     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DATA_2F);
00106     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DATA_3F);
00107     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DATA_4F);
00108     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DATA_9F);
00109     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DATA_16F);
00110     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, GPU_DATA_4UB);
00111 
00112     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, CD_MTFACE);
00113     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, CD_ORCO);
00114     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, CD_TANGENT);
00115     PY_MODULE_ADD_CONSTANT(m, CD_MCOL);
00116     return m;
00117 }

00119 #define PY_DICT_ADD_STRING(d, s, f)      \
00120     val = PyUnicode_FromString(s->f);    \
00121     PyDict_SetItemString(d, # f, val);   \
00122     Py_DECREF(val)
00123 
00124 #define PY_DICT_ADD_LONG(d, s, f)        \
00125     val = PyLong_FromLong(s->f);         \
00126     PyDict_SetItemString(d, # f, val);   \
00127     Py_DECREF(val)
00128 
00129 #define PY_DICT_ADD_ID(d, s, f)                      \
00130     RNA_id_pointer_create((struct ID *)s->f, &tptr); \
00131     val = pyrna_struct_CreatePyObject(&tptr);        \
00132     PyDict_SetItemString(d, # f, val);               \
00133     Py_DECREF(val)
00134 
00135 #define PY_OBJ_ADD_ID(d, s, f)                      \
00136     val = PyUnicode_FromString(&s->f->id.name[2]);  \
00137     PyObject_SetAttrString(d, # f, val);            \
00138     Py_DECREF(val)
00139 
00140 #define PY_OBJ_ADD_LONG(d, s, f)         \
00141     val = PyLong_FromLong(s->f);         \
00142     PyObject_SetAttrString(d, # f, val); \
00143     Py_DECREF(val)
00144 
00145 #define PY_OBJ_ADD_STRING(d, s, f)       \
00146     val = PyUnicode_FromString(s->f);    \
00147     PyObject_SetAttrString(d, # f, val); \
00148     Py_DECREF(val)

00150 PyDoc_STRVAR(GPU_export_shader_doc,
00151 "export_shader(scene, material)\n"
00152 "\n"
00153 "   Returns the GLSL shader that produces the visual effect of material in scene.\n"
00154 "\n"
00155 "   :return: Dictionary defining the shader, uniforms and attributes.\n"
00156 "   :rtype: Dict"
00157 );
00158 static PyObject *GPU_export_shader(PyObject *UNUSED(self), PyObject *args, PyObject *kwds)
00159 {
00160     PyObject *pyscene;
00161     PyObject *pymat;
00162     PyObject *result;
00163     PyObject *dict;
00164     PyObject *val;
00165     PyObject *seq;
00166 
00167     int i;
00168     Scene *scene;
00169     PointerRNA tptr;
00170     Material *material;
00171     GPUShaderExport *shader;
00172     GPUInputUniform *uniform;
00173     GPUInputAttribute *attribute;
00174 
00175     static const char *kwlist[] = {"scene", "material", NULL};
00176 
00177     if (!PyArg_ParseTupleAndKeywords(args, kwds, "OO:export_shader", (char **)(kwlist), &pyscene, &pymat))
00178         return NULL;
00179 
00180     scene = (Scene *)PyC_RNA_AsPointer(pyscene, "Scene");
00181     if (scene == NULL) {
00182         return NULL;
00183     }
00184 
00185     material = (Material *)PyC_RNA_AsPointer(pymat, "Material");
00186     if (material == NULL) {
00187         return NULL;
00188     }
00189 
00190     // we can call our internal function at last:
00191     shader = GPU_shader_export(scene, material);
00192     if (!shader) {
00193         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_RuntimeError, "cannot export shader");
00194         return NULL;
00195     }
00196     // build a dictionary
00197     result = PyDict_New();
00198     if (shader->fragment) {
00199         PY_DICT_ADD_STRING(result, shader, fragment);
00200     }
00201     if (shader->vertex) {
00202         PY_DICT_ADD_STRING(result, shader, vertex);
00203     }
00204     seq = PyList_New(BLI_countlist(&shader->uniforms));
00205     for (i = 0, uniform = shader->uniforms.first; uniform; uniform = uniform->next, i++) {
00206         dict = PyDict_New();
00207         PY_DICT_ADD_STRING(dict, uniform, varname);
00208         PY_DICT_ADD_LONG(dict, uniform, datatype);
00209         PY_DICT_ADD_LONG(dict, uniform, type);
00210         if (uniform->lamp) {
00211             PY_DICT_ADD_ID(dict, uniform, lamp);
00212         }
00213         if (uniform->image) {
00214             PY_DICT_ADD_ID(dict, uniform, image);
00215         }
00216         if (uniform->type == GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DBUFFER ||
00217             uniform->type == GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DIMAGE ||
00218             uniform->type == GPU_DYNAMIC_SAMPLER_2DSHADOW)
00219         {
00220             PY_DICT_ADD_LONG(dict, uniform, texnumber);
00221         }
00222         if (uniform->texpixels) {
00223             val = PyByteArray_FromStringAndSize((const char *)uniform->texpixels, uniform->texsize * 4);
00224             PyDict_SetItemString(dict, "texpixels", val);
00225             Py_DECREF(val);
00226             PY_DICT_ADD_LONG(dict, uniform, texsize);
00227         }
00228         PyList_SET_ITEM(seq, i, dict);
00229     }
00230     PyDict_SetItemString(result, "uniforms", seq);
00231     Py_DECREF(seq);
00232 
00233     seq = PyList_New(BLI_countlist(&shader->attributes));
00234     for (i = 0, attribute = shader->attributes.first; attribute; attribute = attribute->next, i++) {
00235         dict = PyDict_New();
00236         PY_DICT_ADD_STRING(dict, attribute, varname);
00237         PY_DICT_ADD_LONG(dict, attribute, datatype);
00238         PY_DICT_ADD_LONG(dict, attribute, type);
00239         PY_DICT_ADD_LONG(dict, attribute, number);
00240         if (attribute->name) {
00241             if (attribute->name[0] != 0) {
00242                 PY_DICT_ADD_STRING(dict, attribute, name);
00243             }
00244             else {
00245                 val = PyLong_FromLong(0);
00246                 PyDict_SetItemString(dict, "name", val);
00247                 Py_DECREF(val);
00248             }
00249         }
00250         PyList_SET_ITEM(seq, i, dict);
00251     }
00252     PyDict_SetItemString(result, "attributes", seq);
00253     Py_DECREF(seq);
00254 
00255     GPU_free_shader_export(shader);
00256 
00257     return result;
00258 }
00259 
00260 static PyMethodDef meth_export_shader[] = {
00261     {"export_shader", (PyCFunction)GPU_export_shader, METH_VARARGS | METH_KEYWORDS, GPU_export_shader_doc}
00262 };
00263 
00264 PyObject *GPU_initPython(void)
00265 {
00266     PyObject *module = PyInit_gpu();
00267     PyModule_AddObject(module, "export_shader", (PyObject *)PyCFunction_New(meth_export_shader, NULL));
00268     PyDict_SetItemString(PyImport_GetModuleDict(), "gpu", module);
00269 
00270     return module;
00271 }
